source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT COALESCE(sum([rows_copied]), 0) AS total_rows_copied_within_an_hour,
COALESCE(DATEDIFF(s, DATEADD(Hour, -1, GETDATE()), MIN([created_at])), 0) as [wait_in_seconds]
FROM dbo.[IHS_TRACKER]
WHERE [created_at] >= DATEADD(Hour, -1, GETDATE())

WHERE direction = 'Import'

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ID as string,
		TL as string,
		TL_Desc as string,
		HS6 as string,
		HS6_Desc as string,
		Sector_Code as string,
		Base_Rate as string,
		Base_Rate_Alt as string,
		Final_Year as string,
		TLs_Per_6_Digit as string,
		Staging_Basket as string,
		TRQ_Quota as string,
		TRQ_Note as string,
		Tariff_Eliminated as string,
		Product_Type as short,
		Pending_Data as string,
		Ag_ID as string,
		PartnerName as string,
		ReporterName as string,
		StagingBasket as string,
		StagingBasketId as string,
		Num_MAR_Columns as string,
		PartnerStartYear as short,
		ReporterStartYear as short,
		PartnerAgreementName as string,
		ReporterAgreementName as string,
		PartnerAgreementApproved as string,
		ReporterAgreementApproved as string,
		Rule_Text as string,
		QuotaName as string,
		ProductType as string,
		Y2004 as double,
		Alt_2004 as string,
		Y2005 as double,
		Alt_2005 as string,
		Y2006 as double,
		Alt_2006 as string,
		Y2007 as double,
		Alt_2007 as string,
		Y2008 as double,
		Alt_2008 as string,
		Y2009 as double,
		Alt_2009 as string,
		Y2010 as double,
		Alt_2010 as string,
		Y2011 as double,
		Alt_2011 as string,
		Y2012 as double,
		Alt_2012 as string,
		Y2013 as double,
		Alt_2013 as string,
		Y2014 as double,
		Alt_2014 as string,
		Y2015 as double,
		Alt_2015 as string,
		Y2016 as double,
		Alt_2016 as string,
		Y2017 as double,
		Alt_2017 as string,
		Y2018 as double,
		Alt_2018 as string,
		Y2019 as double,
		Alt_2019 as string,
		Y2020 as double,
		Alt_2020 as string,
		Y2021 as double,
		Alt_2021 as string,
		Y2022 as double,
		Alt_2022 as string,
		Y2023 as double,
		Alt_2023 as string,
		Y2024 as double,
		Alt_2024 as string,
		Y2025 as double,
		Alt_2025 as string,
		Y2026 as double,
		Alt_2026 as string,
		Y2027 as double,
		Alt_2027 as string,
		Y2028 as double,
		Alt_2028 as string,
		Y2029 as double,
		Alt_2029 as string,
		Y2030 as double,
		Alt_2030 as string,
		Y2031 as double,
		Alt_2031 as string,
		Y2032 as double,
		Alt_2032 as string,
		Y2033 as double,
		Alt_2033 as string,
		Y2034 as double,
		Alt_2034 as string,
		Y2035 as double,
		Alt_2035 as string,
		Y2036 as double,
		Alt_2036 as string,
		Y2037 as double,
		Alt_2037 as string,
		Y2038 as double,
		Alt_2038 as string,
		Y2039 as double,
		Alt_2039 as string,
		Y2040 as double,
		Alt_2040 as string,
		Y2041 as double,
		Alt_2041 as string,
		Link_Text as string,
		Link_Url as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'raw_file_path',
	wildcardPaths:['*.csv']) ~> FTATariffRatesRawCsv
source(output(
		Country as string,
		FTA_Publication_HS_Code as string,
		FileName as string,
		Industry as string,
		ListID as string,
		ListItemID as short,
		Publication as string,
		PublicationID as string,
		SiteName as string,
		metadata_storage_path as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> FTATariffToolDocumentsRawJson
FTATariffRatesRawCsv derive(document_key = iif(length(Link_Url) > 0, left(toString(TL), 2) + '-' + split(Link_Url, '&dDocName=')[2] + '.pdf', ''),
		transformed_file_path = replace(raw_file_path, '/', '/transformed/')) ~> DerivedColumn1
FTATariffToolDocumentsRawJson derive(document_key = map(split(FTA_Publication_HS_Code, ';'), substring(#item, 1, 2) + '-' + FileName),
		transformed_file_path = '/transformed/documents_delimited_by_newline.json') ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn2 foldDown(unroll(document_key),
	mapColumn(
		Country,
		FTA_Publication_HS_Code,
		FileName,
		Industry,
		ListID,
		ListItemID,
		Publication,
		PublicationID,
		SiteName,
		metadata_storage_path,
		document_key
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenDocumentKey
DerivedColumn1, AggregateByDocumentKey join(DerivedColumn1@document_key == AggregateByDocumentKey@document_key,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
FlattenDocumentKey select(mapColumn(
		FTA_Publication_HS_Code,
		FileName,
		metadata_storage_path,
		document_key
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDocumentColumns
SelectDocumentColumns aggregate(groupBy(document_key),
	each(match(name!='document_key'), $$ = first($$))) ~> AggregateByDocumentKey
Join1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		ID as string,
		TL as string,
		TL_Desc as string,
		HS6 as string,
		HS6_Desc as string,
		Sector_Code as string,
		Base_Rate as string,
		Base_Rate_Alt as string,
		Final_Year as string,
		TLs_Per_6_Digit as string,
		Staging_Basket as string,
		TRQ_Quota as string,
		TRQ_Note as string,
		Tariff_Eliminated as string,
		Product_Type as string,
		Pending_Data as string,
		Ag_ID as string,
		PartnerName as string,
		ReporterName as string,
		StagingBasket as string,
		StagingBasketId as string,
		Num_MAR_Columns as string,
		PartnerStartYear as string,
		ReporterStartYear as string,
		PartnerAgreementName as string,
		ReporterAgreementName as string,
		PartnerAgreementApproved as string,
		ReporterAgreementApproved as string,
		Rule_Text as string,
		Link_Text as string,
		Link_Url as string,
		QuotaName as string,
		ProductType as string,
		Y2004 as string,
		Alt_2004 as string,
		Y2005 as string,
		Alt_2005 as string,
		Y2006 as string,
		Alt_2006 as string,
		Y2007 as string,
		Alt_2007 as string,
		Y2008 as string,
		Alt_2008 as string,
		Y2009 as string,
		Alt_2009 as string,
		Y2010 as string,
		Alt_2010 as string,
		Y2011 as string,
		Alt_2011 as string,
		Y2012 as string,
		Alt_2012 as string,
		Y2013 as string,
		Alt_2013 as string,
		Y2014 as string,
		Alt_2014 as string,
		Y2015 as string,
		Alt_2015 as string,
		Y2016 as string,
		Alt_2016 as string,
		Y2017 as string,
		Alt_2017 as string,
		Y2018 as string,
		Alt_2018 as string,
		Y2019 as string,
		Alt_2019 as string,
		Y2020 as string,
		Alt_2020 as string,
		Y2021 as string,
		Alt_2021 as string,
		Y2022 as string,
		Alt_2022 as string,
		Y2023 as string,
		Alt_2023 as string,
		Y2024 as string,
		Alt_2024 as string,
		Y2025 as string,
		Alt_2025 as string,
		Y2026 as string,
		Alt_2026 as string,
		Y2027 as string,
		Alt_2027 as string,
		Y2028 as string,
		Alt_2028 as string,
		Y2029 as string,
		Alt_2029 as string,
		Y2030 as string,
		Alt_2030 as string,
		Y2031 as string,
		Alt_2031 as string,
		Y2032 as string,
		Alt_2032 as string,
		Y2033 as string,
		Alt_2033 as string,
		Y2034 as string,
		Alt_2034 as string,
		Y2035 as string,
		Alt_2035 as string,
		Y2036 as string,
		Alt_2036 as string,
		Y2037 as string,
		Alt_2037 as string,
		Y2038 as string,
		Alt_2038 as string,
		Y2039 as string,
		Alt_2039 as string,
		Y2040 as string,
		Alt_2040 as string,
		Y2041 as string,
		Alt_2041 as string
	),
	rowUrlColumn:'transformed_file_path',
	truncate: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	quoteAll: true) ~> sink1
DerivedColumn2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn:'transformed_file_path',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> FTaTariffToolDocumentsSink

source(output(
		Country as string,
		FTA_Publication_HS_Code as string,
		FileName as string,
		Industry as string,
		ListID as string,
		ListItemID as string,
		Publication as string,
		PublicationID as string,
		SiteName as string,
		metadata_storage_path as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'raw_file_path',
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> RawDocuments
RawDocuments derive(document_keys = map(split(FTA_Publication_HS_Code, ';'), substring(#item, 1, 2) + '-' + FileName),
		transformed_file_path = replace(raw_file_path, 'raw', 'transformed')) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['/documents_delimited_by_newline.json'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> FTaTariffToolDocumentsSink

source(output(
		Id as string,
		Subject as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> OpenActivitiesStream
OpenActivitiesStream filter(length(Subject) > 0) ~> FilterBlankSubject
FilterBlankSubject sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['filtered_open_activities.json'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> FilteredOpenActivitiesStream

source(output(
		direction as string,
		reporter as string,
		reporter_iso as string,
		partner as string,
		partner_iso as string,
		product as string,
		attribute_unit as string,
		date as string,
		attribute_value as double,
		attribute as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> GstmWorldQuantity
source(output(
		excluded_reporter as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> PostProcessingExcludedReporters
Select1 split(direction == 'Export',
	disjoint: false) ~> DirectionSplit@(ExportData, ImportData)
SortByTotalExportQuantity derive(output_filename = "top_export_reporters.csv") ~> AddExportOutputFilename
SortByTotalImportQuantity derive(output_filename = "top_import_reporters.csv") ~> AddImportOutputFilename
DirectionSplit@ExportData aggregate(groupBy(reporter),
	total_quantity = sum(attribute_value)) ~> GroupByExportReporter
DirectionSplit@ImportData aggregate(groupBy(reporter),
	total_quantity = sum(attribute_value)) ~> GroupByImportReporter
GroupByExportReporter sort(desc(total_quantity, true),
	asc(reporter, true),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SortByTotalExportQuantity
GroupByImportReporter sort(desc(total_quantity, true),
	asc(reporter, true),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SortByTotalImportQuantity
AddLowercaseReporter, PostProcessingExcludedReporters join(lowercase_reporter == excluded_reporter,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinExcludedReporters
JoinExcludedReporters filter(isNull(excluded_reporter)) ~> FilterExcludedReporter
FilterExcludedReporter select(mapColumn(
		direction,
		reporter,
		reporter_iso,
		partner,
		partner_iso,
		product,
		attribute_unit,
		date,
		attribute_value,
		attribute
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
GstmWorldQuantity derive(lowercase_reporter = lower(trim(reporter))) ~> AddLowercaseReporter
AddExportOutputFilename sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn:'output_filename',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TopExportReportersCsv
AddImportOutputFilename sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn:'output_filename',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TopImportReportersCsv

parameters{
	Year as string
}
source(output(
		Currency as string,
		Direction as string,
		Partner as string,
		PartnerIso as string,
		Product as string,
		Quantity as ({Jan 2020} as double, {Feb 2020} as double, {Mar 2020} as double, {Apr 2020} as double, {May 2020} as double, {Jun 2020} as double, {Jul 2020} as double, {Aug 2020} as double, {Sep 2020} as double, {Oct 2020} as double, {Nov 2020} as double, {Dec 2020} as double, {Jan 2021} as double, {Feb 2021} as double, {Mar 2021} as double, {Apr 2021} as double, {May 2021} as double, {Jun 2021} as double, {Jul 2021} as double, {Aug 2021} as double, {Sep 2021} as double, {Oct 2021} as double, {Nov 2021} as double, {Dec 2021} as double),
		Reporter as string,
		ReporterIso as string,
		Unit as string,
		Value as ({Jan 2020} as double, {Feb 2020} as double, {Mar 2020} as double, {Apr 2020} as double, {May 2020} as double, {Jun 2020} as double, {Jul 2020} as double, {Aug 2020} as double, {Sep 2020} as double, {Oct 2020} as double, {Nov 2020} as double, {Dec 2020} as double, {Jan 2021} as double, {Feb 2021} as double, {Mar 2021} as double, {Apr 2021} as double, {May 2021} as double, {Jun 2021} as double, {Jul 2021} as double, {Aug 2021} as double, {Sep 2021} as double, {Oct 2021} as double, {Nov 2021} as double, {Dec 2021} as double)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine',
	wildcardPaths:[("products/{$Year}/**/*.json")]) ~> IHSMarkitJSON
IHSMarkitJSON select(mapColumn(
		direction = Direction,
		reporter = Reporter,
		reporter_iso = ReporterIso,
		partner = Partner,
		partner_iso = PartnerIso,
		product = Product,
		attribute_unit = Unit,
		quantity = Quantity
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectQuantityColumns
SelectQuantityColumns derive(each(quantity, match(true()), $$ = $$)) ~> DerivedQuantities
DerivedQuantities select(mapColumn(
		direction,
		reporter,
		reporter_iso,
		partner,
		partner_iso,
		product,
		attribute_unit,
		each(match(regexMatch(name,`(Jan|Feb|Mar|Apr|May|Jun|Jul|Aug|Sep|Oct|Nov|Dec) (\d+)`)))
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DropQuantity
DropQuantity unpivot(output(
		date as string,
		attribute_value as double
	),
	ungroupBy(direction,
		reporter,
		reporter_iso,
		partner,
		partner_iso,
		product,
		attribute_unit),
	lateral: false,
	ignoreNullPivots: true,
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		reporter,
		direction
	)) ~> UnpivotQuantity
IHSMarkitJSON select(mapColumn(
		direction = Direction,
		partner = Partner,
		partner_iso = PartnerIso,
		product = Product,
		reporter = Reporter,
		reporter_iso = ReporterIso,
		attribute_unit = Currency,
		value = Value
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectValueColumns
SelectValueColumns derive(each(value, match(true()), $$ = $$)) ~> DerivedValues
DerivedValues select(mapColumn(
		direction,
		reporter,
		reporter_iso,
		partner,
		partner_iso,
		product,
		attribute_unit,
		each(match(regexMatch(name,`(Jan|Feb|Mar|Apr|May|Jun|Jul|Aug|Sep|Oct|Nov|Dec) (\d+)`)))
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DropValue
DropValue unpivot(output(
		date as string,
		attribute_value as double
	),
	ungroupBy(direction,
		reporter,
		reporter_iso,
		partner,
		partner_iso,
		product,
		attribute_unit),
	lateral: false,
	ignoreNullPivots: true,
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		reporter,
		direction
	)) ~> UnpivotValue
UnpivotValue derive(attribute = "Value",
		output_filename = "transformed/{$Year}_value.csv") ~> AddValueStaticColumns
UnpivotQuantity filter(in(['KG', 'T'], attribute_unit)) ~> FilterAttributeUnitInKGOrT
FilterAttributeUnitInKGOrT split(attribute_unit == 'KG',
	disjoint: false) ~> AttributeUnitSplit@(AttributeUnitInKg, AttributeUnitInT)
AttributeUnitSplit@AttributeUnitInKg derive(quantity = attribute_value) ~> AddQuantityColumnForKg
AttributeUnitSplit@AttributeUnitInT derive(quantity = attribute_value * 1000) ~> AddQuantityColumnForT
AddQuantityColumnForKg, AddQuantityColumnForT union(byName: true)~> NormalizedQuantityInKg
NormalizedQuantityInKg select(mapColumn(
		direction,
		reporter,
		reporter_iso,
		partner,
		partner_iso,
		product,
		date,
		attribute_value = quantity
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ReplaceAttributeValueWithQuantity
ReplaceAttributeValueWithQuantity derive(attribute = "Quantity",
		attribute_unit = "KG",
		output_filename = "transformed/{$Year}_quantity.csv",
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		reporter
	)) ~> AddQuantityStaticColumns
AddQuantityStaticColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn:'output_filename',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SinkQuantity
AddValueStaticColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn:'output_filename',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SinkValue

source(output(
		HS as string,
		PARTNER as string,
		Y_2010 as long,
		Y_2011 as long,
		Y_2012 as long,
		Y_2013 as long,
		Y_2014 as long,
		Y_2015 as long,
		Y_2016 as long,
		Y_2017 as long,
		Y_2018 as long,
		Y_2019 as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> AeroDefenseExportsCsv
AeroDefenseExportsCsv unpivot(output(
		year as string,
		Value as long
	),
	ungroupBy(HS,
		PARTNER),
	lateral: false,
	ignoreNullPivots: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> Unpivot1
Unpivot1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['AeroDefenseTotalExportsPivoted.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
